title: Question:
author: Anslki
content: Have you recently lost your crypto and need help? Worry no more as we got your back. Write to us today and we'll help you recover your stolen or lost funds. Telegram: @Anslki or email: ansleybrooke650atgmaildotcom

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Anslki on October 04, 2023, 10:42:40 AMHave you recently lost your crypto and need help? Worry no more as we got your back. Write to us today and we'll help you recover your stolen or lost funds. Telegram: @Anslki or email: ansleybrooke650atgmaildotcomCan you share or explain how are you planning to do that or what kind of ways youll employ to recover funds? Are we talking about non custodial related wallet that got sweep or hacked? To be honest if stolen thats kinda hard to get cause the stealer must have alreadu been consume or transfer it to another wallet. This thread must be on service section I think.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on October 04, 2023, 10:53:26 AMQuote from: Anslki on October 04, 2023, 10:42:40 AMHave you recently lost your crypto and need help? Worry no more as we got your back. Write to us today and we'll help you recover your stolen or lost funds. Telegram: @Anslki or email: ansleybrooke650atgmaildotcomCan you share or explain how are you planning to do that or what kind of ways youll employ to recover funds? Are we talking about non custodial related wallet that got sweep or hacked? To be honest if stolen thats kinda hard to get cause the stealer must have alreadu been consume or transfer it to another wallet. This thread must be on service section I think. There is no need to waste much of your time on posts like this where users claim they have an agent who helped them recover a scammed or hacked wallet; they are just looking for means to steal from those who have already been scammed, as they will be asked to pay some money in order for them to get their lost money back, and if the user still has some money left in their wallet, they make away with it.Â These are just scammers looking for means to scam people who have been scammed through the means of fund recovery; these scammers don't have petty for the scammed.I believe the moderators will delete the topic with time.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: I have been having this thought all these while. Why is that it is newbie accounts with no activities that is always coming up with services. They have no reputation and are not well established or is that they are afraid of using their real account identity for this service with the fear of being flagged? Well I have no doubt this is not different from other posts I have read on this platform about recovering lost keys and lots more. There is no difference between this post and how scammers do in their dirty jobs mate.

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: Quote from: Anslki on October 04, 2023, 10:42:40 AMHave you recently lost your crypto and need help? Worry no more as we got your back. Write to us today and we'll help you recover your stolen or lost funds. Telegram: @Anslki or email: ansleybrooke650atgmaildotcomLOL hahahahahaha, There is nothing that you can do to recover lost assets.Avoid to send any information to this guy. This is scammer behaivor.It's not safe to share personal information with strangers.No One to Blame, If things go wrong, it's hard to find who's responsible.Some of these accounts might be trying to trick you. New accounts haven't shown they can be trusted
